profile.title: Profile
profile.delete_description:
When deleting a user, all information will be removed from the database. The user will no longer be able to login or access/update information about the student nation.

This action is irreversible. If the account might be needed in the future, it is recommended to instead deactivate the account.

Deactivation of the user will have the same result as deleting the user, but it allows you to reactivate it in the future

deactivate.title: Do you really want to deactivate this account?
deactivate.description: This means that the chosen user will no longer be able to login or access/change information within the student nation. You can reactivate the account at any time

delete.title: Do you really want to delete this account?
delete.description: The chosen account will be permanently deleted. You can not undo this action!
